2886:277: none“> ma [ ma ] ṇḍa [ la ] ṃ|
2886:305: none“> tāś ca punar āpo vāyubhir
2886:576: none“> ye satvā bhūtasa [ ṃ ] svedajas
2886:998: none“> yāvad āyanti sāmagrīn na labhate
2886:1135: none“> idānīn taṃ madīyaṃ kalevaram iti|
2886:1212: none“> arthaḥ kartun na śakyata iti kṛtvā
2886:1505: none“> imam arthaṃ dyota [ ya ] n āha
2886:1756: none“> atha strī tato vāmaṃ kukṣim
2886:2101: none“> kulā hy ete tu vai paṃca
2886:2630: none“> hetuñ ca phalam adhigato mantrī
2886:3710: none“> ye satvās te ca buddhāḥ syus
2886:4184: none“> adhaḥ pāde ca tiṣṭhet tu
2886:4426: none“> sudṛḍhaṃ gṛhṇata bodhicitta [ ssa ] saṃjñam
2886:4498: none“> so'vadat sandhāya śū ( sic ) kṣmakam|| ||
2886:4518: none“> skandhā ete hi buddhāḥ syur
2886:4723: none“> [ rasa ] ś ca pañcamaṃ yāti
2886:4747: none“> vijñānaṃ ca prabhāśva ( sic ) raṃ||
